game.name: Randy The Racoon
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Use cartoony weapons, run over humans, take down the Goose Mafia that wants you dead, drop giant snowballs into crowds, fly your stunt car across a packed island. Do whatever you want in this Simpsons Hit & Run-inspired open world-sandbox!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Use cartoony weapons, run over humans, take down the Goose Mafia that wants you dead, drop giant snowballs into crowds, fly your stunt car across a packed island. Do whatever you want in this Simpsons Hit & Run-inspired open world-sandbox!
